Description:

MMA8452Q 3-Axis, 12/8-bit Digital Accelerometer

  • Supply Voltage: 1.6-3.6V
  • Range: +/- 2g, 4g, 8g
  • Interface: I2C, 12-bit and 8-bit
  • ODR: 1.56 Hz - 800 Hz
  • Package: QFN-16
